title: Create vote-lock ticket

thumbsupNotice.title: Whitelist requirement
thumbsupNotice.body: To create tickets, you must hold an equivalent amount of THUMBSUP.1 tokens on the BitShares blockchain. These can be acquired from the user 'abit'. They are required to whitelist voters on-chain.

description: Lock BTS for a fixed period to gain voting power.
lockTypeDescription: Choose how long to lock your tokens. Longer locks give more voting power.
amountDescription: Enter how many BTS to lock.
summary: Lock {{amount}} {{asset}} for voting power equivalent to {{eq}} {{asset}}.

leaderChange.title: Tickets snapshot
leaderChange.note: Fetching a small sample of recent tickets to give context.

myTickets.title: My tickets
myTickets.description: Your current tickets, totals, and effective voting power.

updateDialog.title: Update ticket
updateDialog.description: Change the ticket lock type. Optionally, provide additional amount to retarget.
